VBZ-Compression
===============

# Available modules


The overview below shows which VBZ-Compression installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using VBZ-Compression, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load VBZ-Compression/1.0.3-gompi-2023a
```
